articles.description: Luton Town miss out on the chance to move out of the relegation zone as they are held by Everton in the Premier League.
articles.title: Luton stay in bottom three after draw with Everton

articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen beat Ferrari’s Charles Leclerc to take pole position for the sprint race at the Miami Grand Prix.
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix: Max Verstappen beats Charles Leclerc to sprint pole

articles.description: West Ham hold talks with Julen Lopetegui and could make a decision on boss David Moyes' future before the end of the season.
articles.title: Julen Lopetegui in West Ham talks amid David Moyes uncertainty

articles.description: Former Premier League referee Mark Clattenburg leaves his role with Nottingham Forest, saying his  position had "become more of a hindrance than help" to the club.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: Mark Clattenburg leaves analyst role with Premier League club

articles.description: If there is one thing  Jurgen Klopp will not miss about English football, it is the Premier League's early kick-off on a Saturday. But have Liverpool been unfairly targeted?
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp says early kick-offs are a 'crime' - does Liverpool boss have a point?

articles.description: In her BBC Sport column, boxing analyst Claudia Trejos says Mexican Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez may only be appreciated after he retires.
articles.title: Saul Canelo Alvarez vs Jamie Munguia: Las Vegas fight analysis

articles.description: With some of the NBA's biggest stars out of the play-offs, BBC Sport takes a look at three names who are worth keeping an eye on.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Players to watch with LeBron James, Stephen Curry & Kevin Durant out

articles.description: England women name their squads for the two white-ball series against Pakistan, which begin later this month.
articles.title: England women v Pakistan: Linsey Smith & Freya Kemp given chance to impress

articles.description: Kyren Wilson produces a clinical display of potting to open up a 14-10 lead over David Gilbert in their World Championship semi-final.
articles.title: World Championship: Kyren Wilson pulls clear against David Gilbert in semi-final

articles.description: Former New Zealand all-rounder Corey Anderson is named in the United States' squad for the T20 World Cup in June.
articles.title: T20 World Cup 2024: Corey Anderson named in USA squad
